properties.name: We Begin
properties.message: The first leg of our hike was perfect, waterfalls and beautiful views that only got better as we climbed toward the peak.

properties.name: The Perfect End
properties.message: It was the perfect end to an exilerating adventure. We said our thanks to the couple in the pick-up and got back into our car, weary but better men.

properties.name: Sunset
properties.message: We were only about halfway down the mountain face when the sun set. As we hiked in the cold and dark we looked side to side for a place we could pitch our tent. But the path was too narrow and the slopes on either side were too steep.

properties.name: At the Peak
properties.message: We sat on the peak and watched the sun move toward the horizon.

properties.name: Picked up by a Pick-up
properties.message: We still had two miles to go when we decided to stick out our thumbs. After a minute a nice couple in a pick-up stopped and we climbed into the bed.

properties.name: Seeing Other People
properties.message: For the first time in 12 hours we saw other hikers.

properties.name: Not Yet Done
properties.message: As we came out of the woods into the parking area full of people, it felt like we had come to the end of our hike. But the road sign said it was another four miles to where we parked. Only now we were walking on the side of a highway.

properties.name: We Make Camp
properties.message: Finally we came to a bend in the path that made an area just large enough for our tent and a fire. But the fire wasn't so easy because the path was covered in thick ice and snow. After half an hour of failed attempts we managed to get it going and settled down for the night.
